message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be fair to propose a price of $1100000 for this exceptional item. We understand its value to you exceeds $1200000, and we hope this offer reflects a balance between our valuation and your perceived worth. Let us know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $1050000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. While I understand your budgetary constraints, I must respectfully decline your counteroffer. Our company has invested significantly in this product, and we believe it is worth more than what you're currently proposing. We would like to revisit our initial offer at $1100000. I hope this aligns better with your considerations and we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I am unable to meet your current offer of $1100000. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I am willing to pay up to $1075000. I hope this revised offer is within your acceptable range.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I must decline your latest offer. We stand firm in our valuation of the product at $1100000. However, I am willing to make a concession to close the deal. My counteroffer to you is $1090000. This is the highest amount we are willing to accept. I hope this proposal is within your budget and allows us to reach a satisfactory agreement.
